mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat(user_id, message, session_id, is_ai) VALUES (#{userId}, #{message}, #{sessionId}, #{isAi})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, session_id, COUNT(*) AS messageCount, (SELECT message FROM chat c2 WHERE c2.user_id = c1.user_id AND c2.session_id = c1.session_id ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1) AS content, MAX(create_time) AS lastMessageTime, MIN(create_time) AS firstMessageTime FROM chat c1 WHERE user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY user_id, session_id ORDER BY lastMessageTime DESC
SELECT id, user_id, session_id, message, is_ai, create_time FROM chat WHERE session_id = #{sessionId} order by create_time
